alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 3:31PM EDT until June 30 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Southern Troup County in west central Georgia... Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 331 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Durand to Baughs Crossroads to Lakeview, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, West Point, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Cataula, Mountain Hill, Jones Crossroads, Bartletts Ferry Dam, Baughs Crossroads, Fortson, Pine Mountain Valley, Mulberry Grove, Whitesville-Pine Lake and Lake Harding. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
